UniprotID	Q8IYV9
Accession	Q8IYV9;Q6Q8P6;Q6Q8P7
EntryName	IZUM1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Izumo sperm-egg fusion protein 1 (Oocyte binding/fusion factor) (OBF) (Sperm-specific protein izumo)
GeneName	IZUMO1
Length	350
Function	Essential sperm cell-surface protein required for fertilization by acting as a ligand for IZUMO1R/JUNO receptor on egg. The IZUMO1:IZUMO1R/JUNO interaction is a necessary adhesion event between sperm and egg that is required for fertilization but is not sufficient for cell fusion. The ligand-receptor interaction probably does not act as a membrane 'fusogen'. Acts a ligand for the human-specific oolemma epitope FCRL3/MAIA during fertilization (PubMed:36070373). FCRL3/MAIA replaces IZUMO1R/JUNO as IZUMO1 receptor after sperm-egg adhesion, which permits species-specific gamete fusion (PubMed:36070373). Plays a critical role in sperm-oolemma binding prior to plasma membrane fusion. Can mediate cell-cell fusion in cultured mammalian cells independently of its binding to IZUMO1R/JUNO (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Acrosome membrane
Disorder	0.0364,0.0231,0.0258,0.0372,0.0240,0.0178,0.0136,0.0223,0.0240,0.0349,0.0443,0.0306,0.0214,0.0111,0.0080,0.0127,0.0146,0.0218,0.0235,0.0281,0.0205,0.0205,0.0202,0.0235,0.0231,0.0240,0.0454,0.0765,0.0662,0.0424,0.0231,0.0275,0.0473,0.0704,0.0749,0.1373,0.1092,0.0870,0.0851,0.1229,0.1702,0.2164,0.2064,0.2541,0.2715,0.2783,0.2951,0.2918,0.3053,0.2645,0.2988,0.3807,0.3566,0.2436,0.2503,0.3494,0.2575,0.2884,0.2129,0.2258,0.2470,0.2575,0.2609,0.2064,0.2094,0.1914,0.1399,0.1449,0.1373,0.1424,0.1424,0.1969,0.1349,0.1323,0.2328,0.2224,0.2064,0.1969,0.1969,0.2002,0.1275,0.1162,0.1184,0.0888,0.1476,0.1731,0.1115,0.1554,0.2164,0.2064,0.2002,0.1731,0.1671,0.2364,0.2364,0.1702,0.0948,0.0676,0.1137,0.1251,0.1275,0.1070,0.0631,0.0483,0.0494,0.0494,0.0313,0.0568,0.0543,0.0555,0.0581,0.0275,0.0341,0.0356,0.0214,0.0153,0.0205,0.0389,0.0287,0.0313,0.0275,0.0483,0.0835,0.0851,0.0555,0.1048,0.1137,0.1643,0.0909,0.0929,0.0618,0.0494,0.0646,0.0799,0.0799,0.0888,0.0799,0.0531,0.0281,0.0543,0.0543,0.0294,0.0258,0.0294,0.0555,0.0734,0.0592,0.0473,0.0258,0.0483,0.0463,0.0631,0.0443,0.0734,0.0364,0.0356,0.0618,0.0967,0.1643,0.2094,0.2292,0.1702,0.2918,0.3019,0.2783,0.2783,0.3426,0.3182,0.2783,0.3087,0.3215,0.2258,0.2436,0.2645,0.2645,0.2817,0.2783,0.2715,0.2470,0.2328,0.3053,0.2884,0.2752,0.2541,0.2575,0.2034,0.1881,0.1070,0.0749,0.1137,0.1229,0.0676,0.1229,0.1206,0.1823,0.1759,0.2752,0.2783,0.2034,0.1731,0.1731,0.1554,0.1554,0.2129,0.2224,0.1881,0.2783,0.2064,0.3117,0.3948,0.4186,0.4441,0.4766,0.4766,0.4940,0.4979,0.5055,0.4582,0.4507,0.5254,0.4901,0.4979,0.3872,0.4051,0.3321,0.3149,0.3392,0.2783,0.3566,0.3494,0.3529,0.3566,0.3599,0.4220,0.3494,0.2503,0.2436,0.1501,0.1759,0.1323,0.1399,0.1671,0.1137,0.2292,0.2094,0.2609,0.1881,0.1881,0.2609,0.2715,0.2680,0.3019,0.2752,0.3321,0.3392,0.3392,0.3566,0.3529,0.4831,0.4831,0.5665,0.5296,0.6089,0.7120,0.6991,0.7036,0.7331,0.7250,0.7289,0.6089,0.5951,0.6427,0.5098,0.5211,0.5211,0.5296,0.6227,0.6712,0.5620,0.4940,0.4901,0.4766,0.4292,0.3494,0.3
